entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
